title: AXA – MoneySmart Summer Trip Exclusive
content: From 28 Jul to 10 Aug 2025, get gifts worth HK$3,100, a 7-month VHIS waiver, Birdie SIM, and prize draw for luggage, lounge pass or AirTag.

title: FWD – Summer Flash Sale
content: From 29–31 Jul, get Trip.com voucher for claims over HK$200; extra prizes apply for purchases above HK$150.
